sn47.38:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ.
sn47.38:1.4: Tassa kāye kāyānupassino viharato kāyo pariññāto hoti.
sn47.38:2.1: Vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ.
sn47.38:2.2: Tassa vedanāsu vedanānupassino viharato vedanā pariññātā honti.
sn47.38:3.1: Citte cittānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ.
sn47.38:3.2: Tassa citte cittānupassino viharato cittaṃ pariññātaṃ hoti.
sn47.38:4.1: Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ.
sn47.38:4.2: Tassa dhammesu dhammānupassino viharato dhammā pariññātā honti.
